summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the licensing and regulation of certain businesses, places of amusement and entertainment, including cabarets, public dance halls, dancing in hotels, restaurants, cafes, taverns and other public resorts, amending Section 58, 81, 82, 83, 83A and 83B of the License Code (Ordinance No. 48022) and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith.
